text: Curious about the use cases. <@UA5DFM7CK> would you be comfortable sharing how your clients leverage child themes? Is it a situation where different divisions within a single org need slightly different styling within the same domain?

Can you send me a DM with a link to the file or copy of the file you’re seeing this in?

it would help us to troubleshoot exactly whats happening.

Hey Team,
I have to implement new page on HubSpot. Basically, I need to show some post*(but this is not a blog page)* and when user click on that post then user should land on details page. So, there is any free template are available on HubSpot or do I need to create the custom template for this. If, I need to create custom template then how we can get the post and and link with details page.
Kindly guide me.
Thank you
